bibl.title: Hellenization and Onomastic Change. The Case of Egyptian P3-dỉ / Πετε-Names.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Methodology. - 3. P3-dỉ / T3-dỉ-DN as theophoric names. - 4. The decline of P3-dỉ-names. - 5. The decline: appearance or reality? - 6. The onomastic hellenization of Egypt. - 7. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Jennes Gwen and Mark Depauw, Hellenization and Onomastic Change. The Case of Egyptian P3-dỉ / Πετε-Names.

1. Introduction. - 2. Methodology. - 3. P3-dỉ / T3-dỉ-DN as theophoric names. - 4. The decline of P3-dỉ-names. - 5. The decline: appearance or reality? - 6. The onomastic hellenization of Egypt. - 7. Conclusion.
